article_title: The Week in Pictures, Media Overdrive Edition
article_text:
“Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.” Winston Churchill

“Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.” Inscription on the Liberty Bell

og.description: Hey, I hear Nelson Mandela died this week.  But I haven’t heard very much about him in the media, especially the big three networks.  I know I want more coverage.  More interviews with Bill C…
og.title: The Week in Pictures, Media Overdrive Edition
